quizTitle: Which Completely Random Job Would You Actually Be Good At?

questionsArray.questionTitle: How often do you watch or read the news?
Are you more of an indoor or outdoor person?
How often do you eat out?

resultArray.resultDescription: So many of us are over politics, but you are invested in the news cycle like it's your job. How about you make it your job by becoming a political reporter and engrossing yourself in all aspects of media? You're trustworthy, well-spoken, and deeply knowledgable, so it only makes sense.

The environment is important to you and there's nothing you love more than taking in nature with the great outdoors. Life as a beekeeper is not only rewarding (you get to sell a product), but also educational (you get to educate people on the importance of sustainability). It'd truly be a win-win for you. And don't worry, those beekeeper suits keep the stingers away.

There's no denying that you are one of the most artistic and creative people in your group of friends, so why not apply these talents to the salon floor as a nail technician? You get to come up with original designs, pamper your clientele, and get unlimited access to nearly every shade of your favorite designer polish. Sounds like a good time to us.

If you're not eating food, you don't mind playing with it. And since you're also creative and great with photography, the role of a food stylist would suit you well. Just be sure to not eat the props. You'd immediately get fired.
